caller_intent: Byron Carson wants to add renters insurance for his son (Byron Hall) to his existing policy, as his son is starting college and requires coverage for his apartment in Raleigh.
resolution_steps: Heather confirms the policyholder's details (Byron and Angela Carson) and the insured's information (Byron Hall, DOB 2005).
Heather gathers the apartment address (1402 Gorman Street, Raleigh, NC 27606) and management company (Rhyne Management Associates).
Discusses coverage details: $25,000 personal property, $500,000 liability, $500 deductible.
Clarifies whether Byron Hall or Angela Carson should be listed on the policy (lease is in Byron's name, so only he needs to be listed).
Notes moving date (August 1) and agrees to send a quote for review by the weekend, with finalization next week.
knowledge_required: Underwriting requirements for adding new insureds
summary: Byron Carson requested renters insurance for his son starting college. Heather collected policy details, apartment information, coverage preferences, and lease terms. A quote will be sent for review, with finalization planned for next week. The call resolved the initial request with clear next steps.
